title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
Wrap yourself in the cozy flavors of fall with The Republic of Tea Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas. This festive bundle pairs two caffeine-free favorites—Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea—each with 36 round, unbleached tea bags for a total of 72 comforting cups.

- Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea: Capture the orchard-fresh warmth of apple cider with a soothing blend of apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, ginger, cloves, and a whisper of cardamom. It’s naturally caffeine-free, perfectly spiced, and deliciously nostalgic.

- Caramel Apple Herbal Tea: Indulge your sweet tooth—without the sugar rush—with a velvety blend of South African rooibos, real apple bits, caramel and apple natural flavors, and vanilla. It’s a dessert-like sip that feels like a caramel-dipped apple by the fireside.

Brew effortlessly: Steep one tea bag in 6 oz of freshly boiling water for 5–7 minutes. Enjoy straight or add a splash of milk and honey for an extra treat. When you’re done, toss used tea bags into your compost or garden soil for an eco-friendly touch.

Why you’ll love it:
- Limited-edition fall flavors that feel like sweater weather in a cup
- Naturally caffeine-free—perfect day or night
- Thoughtfully blended botanicals with rich, layered taste
- A delightful gift for hosts, teachers, and tea lovers
- Ideal as a cozy afternoon pick-me-up or a guilt-free dessert tea

Celebrate the harvest season with every sip. Bring home this comforting duo and make your fall moments more delicious.
